Description:
Verify that double-clicking on a bookmark causes it to be launched in
      a browser window
Verify that there are no 'dead' default links.

Determine whether text can be copied and pasted from text fields
      within a dialog box.

Verify that dragging onto a frame-set
      page loads the dragged content properly.

Verify that items dragged onto the
      application icon are handled properly

Determine if the application and OS properly
      handle items dragged from the Bookmark Manager

Verify that dragging a large (e.g. 5 MB) image across
      browser windows, to desktop, and into mail message
      works properly.

Feature:
D&D <a href="/drag-url-browser-toolbar/">
      Given link is non-fetchable, non-retrievable Personal Toolbar
Description: Determine if you can drag items to and from the Personal Toolbar

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.

Verify that you have the ability to search by typing keyword
        synonyms, and verbs to bring up related topics in help content. Verify
        that if the entered phrase may not actually exist in the help document,
        but it is related to topic.

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content. (Verify the content is in local
        documents)

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't send Instant Messages."

Determine whether Netscape Technical Support displays
        correctly
Determine whether International Users displays correctly
Verify that columns are resizable to show/hide more of entries

Verify that things that aren't supposed to be added to history
        aren't (eg chorme:/// url's)
Verify browser goes back and forward to recently visited sites

Verify browser goes back and forward correctly from page with
        frames.

Determine that you are not able to resize an image to window when
        there is also text on the page, this is a stand alone image feature
        only.
Determine that you are able to set image as wallpaper.

Determine whether GIF 89a images are properly displayed across
        different bit depths.
Test lifecycle of applets

Feature: Save username and password, never for this site
Description:
Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when the password manager has been disabled, it is no
      longer in use, even for passwords already saved

Verify that when you enable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you are asked if you would like to save usernames and passwords
      and get prefilled info on sites

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      preferences

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through tasks (nbci.com)

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager

Feature: Tasks, passwords never saved, remove all
Description:
Verify that you can remove all site and username information from the
      passwords never saved section of password manager
Determine if tables print correctly
Determine if print Preview works correctly
Determine id Page Setup dialog works correctly
Determine if files with various sound formats play properly
Verify that starting a URL bar search triggers the sidebar
Verify that a user can change the search engine

Determine whether discontiguous selection of table cells function
        properly.
Verify that nothing changes when you cancel
Verify that links in Bookmarks work
Verify that adding of a panel using javascript works

Determine that interface features (buttons, textfield, droplist)
        appear and behave as expected. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Find forwards and backwards within a document. Test Find
        Again.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the source window. Also
        should be able to use keyboard accelerators. Resize source window.

Attempt to view page info for plain text, xml, ftp listing,
        directory listing...
Verify Classic theme works as advertised

Feature: Verify all the selectable items work under Modern theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar, tool bars, and floating
        component bar under Modern theme
Verify the title is correct, "<page title> - Mozilla"

The active window is visually distinct, inactive = grey title
        bar.

Grab any corner of window and drag to resize. Only bottom-right
        corner on Mac.
Click up arrow to scroll page
Verify that component buttons work and behave as appropriate.
